Keywords

Faction

  1. Some cards refer to Autobots or Decepticons. How do I know which characters are Autobots?
    Autobots have a red frame and the Autobot insignia in the lower right corner. Decepticons have a purple frame and the Decepticon insignia in the lower right corner. A few characters have "Autobot" or "Decepticon" in their names, although these arenâ€™t the only Autobots and Decepticons.
  2. What is a 'Faction'?
    Characters belong to a Faction. Currently each Transformer can only belong to one Faction, though there are characters in the Transformer storylines who were double-agents and so that may change. There are currently (Wave 5) three factions in the game, Autobots, Decepticons and Mercenaries.
  3. Who are the Mercenaries?
    The Mercenary Faction is a new faction added to the Transformer storyline in 2019, across the comics, toys, cartoons, and the Trading Card Game, which was the first to announce the new faction.
